website_summaries.verdict: Organize even a very large collection of spices with no wasted shelf space.
pros: Adjustable to fit any size cabinet from 7.5-inches to 17-inches wide
Shelves can be stacked or used side by side
cons: When fully extended to 17 inches, may sag in the middle under weight of heavy spice bottles

customer_reviews.title: Measure first, very functional.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little nerve wracking putting this together as you have to push pretty hard to get the legs in. It doesn't fit all the way across my cabinet either, but its good enough. It cured a heck of a mess and makes it easier to see now so we dont keep purchasing duplicates.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my cupboard organized and easy to find and grab any spice. Easy to install. Wish it came in black.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: This works just fine but it's a nightmare to assemble and get it ...
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine but it's a nightmare to assemble and get it right!! Without help I would never have been able to put it together correctly. It's sturdy and does hold all of my spices as I have 49 bottles!!! I needed a large size and this did it. Did 4 stars only because of the assembly problem that took quite a while to fix and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ohgram

customer_reviews.title: UNSTABLE, DISAPPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy, not worth the $20. I assembled this item first with the tall legs and the runner supports and even up against the back and one side of the cabinet it was unstable. I put it together with the shorter legs and there was no improvement. As far as space saving is concerned it's a good idea, just a cheap execution. Don't waste your time, it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: LJK

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Assemble, and Works Like a Charm!
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect for what I need it to do. Fits just right, is more than sturdy enough, and has made my absolutely nightmarish spice cabinet look awesome. No more duplicate spices going bad in the back of the cabinet! It’s not at all difficult to assemble. Watch the videos, all of them (they’re short) before you start opening the parts bags. Otherwise it’s easy to get intimidated by all of the extra pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Congaree

customer_reviews.title: Short legs are too short!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like this product. I have a lot of spices and wanted a way to organize them, but be able to see all of them. The set up was a bit annoying, but easy. However, once it came to putting my spices away, I found that my spice bottles are about 1/2" taller than the first shelf on short legs (see pictures)! I was devastated because I have a lot of these types of bottles. While the long legs would've worked, it would've been too tall to put the same bottles on top. Unfortunately, I am renting an apartment and can't drill holes in the cabinets. I packed it up and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim F.

customer_reviews.title: A billion pieces and then it broke!!
customer_reviews.text: I. hate. this. thing! I was so happy to find something that would help organize my spice cupboard. I opened the box, and what I found were a hundred tiny pieces. I get it, it gives you every option so you can fit it literally into any cupboard. Except mine, apparently?? This thing sucked. It was horrible to put together and impossible to maneuver into the cupboard. When I finally almost had it, it gave way, I sliced my hand on something and a piece of it completely snapped of! What a waste of 30 bucks!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Spice

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this product. I was intimidated by all the parts right out of the box but it was actually really easy set up. Took me 10 minutes at the most. 4 stars because the price is a little steep for being plastic. Otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Raychill

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest invention everyone can use this in their cabinets
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest invention everyone can use this in their cabinets. I used mine in medicine cabinet, everything is at eye level and within view no more digging around looking for something.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: I can actually find things now
customer_reviews.text: I got these after seeing them in my niece's cupboard. What I love is that now I have fewer items to move to actually find things, and having these shelves gives me a bit of an organization system so that I know that certain things are on the lower part and others on the top shelf. I do plan to get more and organize other cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: Pitufo1955

customer_reviews.title: Not Ideal for a small Cupboard
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as it says it will fit any cabinet-however that is not the case. The shelving unit is adjustable from left to right but not forward. So as long as the cupboard is deep enough then it will fit just fine. But my cupboard is shallow so it literally sticks out the front and the cupboard doors arent able to shut. Note to the manufacturers- make it so that all aspects of the shelving unit are able to be adjusted and not fixed. Then this product really would be able to stand behind the "fits any cabinet" claim.
customer_reviews.author: CarlaMT

customer_reviews.title: Where are the rest of my spices!
customer_reviews.text: I got nervous i would be up all night putting this together, but i didn't need most of the parts. It's nice they have anything you might possibly need! After i put it together (5min) I seriously was looking up and down my counter trying to figure out where i put the rest of my spices....i can't believe they all fit with plenty of room to spare!!!
customer_reviews.author: DiaseyMay

customer_reviews.title: This i s a great product for organizing an overlooked area of the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This i s a great product for organizing an overlooked area of the kitchen. Very easy to assemble and install. Looks great and fits any shelf. Fully adjustable to shelf sizes. The only thing that I would change would be to include an intermediate sized upright. The free basket I got with it cane in real handy and is also fully adjustable to fit any shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce M. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful investment
customer_reviews.text: I attached a before and after picture to this review which is all that really needs to be said. This is an excellent product. I was concerned it wouldn't fit my narrow cabinets but it surprised me how flexible this is in how you can put it together. Between the tall and small legs and the width extensions, you can make this as small or large as you need it to be. Now that I have the bottom shelf worked out, time to get more of these or figure out what I will do with the other shelves.
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: So great!! No more clutter and very easy to assemble! Going to buy more for my other cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Not for my size cabinets
customer_reviews.text: This shelf didn’t fit my cabinet I had purchased it for. Even at it’s smallest size, the shelf was still half an inch too wide. I ended up using it in my full sized cabinet. Using the shortest legs, it still didn’t fit extract bottles. I just can’t win with this shelf! For those who have the right sized cabinets, this would be a great spice organizer. Mine fell into that 1% group sadly. I will probably take it apart & send it back, because every time I open my full sized cabinet I get irritated that it’s being used for spices & extracts instead of dishes, glasses etc.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Not for different sized containers
customer_reviews.text: Created more clutter than it solved. If you have odd and varying shapped seasoning containers, this rack probably wont do you any good. As the picture shows, its BEST used with containers on the adaptor same shape and size. Additionally, if stacking as I intended on doing, you should measure your tallest container and be sure that you have more than twice that height between shelves. I was not very keen on all of the pieces, it was very much like putting together a lego set. Returned in lui of a simple stel type of organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Major space saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best investments for the kitchen! Cleaned up so much clutter in the cabinet and was quickly able to organize each shelf by baking and seasoning :)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Another great idea
customer_reviews.text: The overall concept of this cabinet system is cool. The set up was easy and the storage capacity did make a huge difference in my limited cabinet space. However, it does seem a little flimsy before you put into the cabinet but once it's in and put in place it does seem supportive. When I say I have limited cabinet space or even counter space, it's not under statement. If I adjust the shelf to accommodate the two-tier version, I would loose the ability to store everything on the upper shelves. My cabinet's are not 42" cabinet. So I just made them the tall version and used a lazy suzan that I had for the other stuff. It works.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, versatile, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy happy happy that I can once again open my spice cupboard without having an avalanche of spice bottles roll out! This spicy shelf is sturdy, versatile (it can be set up in several different ways), and fairly easy to assemble. Probably very easy to assemble for those that don't make things more complicated than they need to be, like I have a habit of doing 🙄😊. I would recommend this to anyone who buys an over abundance of spices and wants to keep them organized, as well as not having to say "open that cupboard at your own risk".
customer_reviews.author: Kat V

customer_reviews.title: IT IS FINISHED. CLUTTER FREE.
customer_reviews.text: RECEV'D 3rd SHIPMENT. MOVED EVERTHING FROM SMALLER CABINET-WIDER CABINET. ADDED 3 MORE SHELFS. NO MORE CLUTTER. REMOVED ORIGINAL INTERNAL CABINET SHELF TO INSTALL SPICEY SHELF. ASSEMBLY FASTER THIS TIME. WELL WRITTEN INSTRUCTIONS & PICTORIALS ENCLOSED. A WELCOMED ORGANIZATIONAL TOOL FOR FOOD & SPICES, MEDICINES OR COSMETICS. A VERSITLE PRODUCT BUILT TO HOLD A SURPRISING AMOUNT OF WEIGHT. I AM HAPPY W/THE PRODUCT & CHANGES IT HAS BROUGHT TO MY KITCHEN. PRICE WAS ECONOMICAL. DELIVERY IS ALWAYS FAST.
customer_reviews.author: Lindalou

customer_reviews.title: Spicy Shelf Deluxe
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. It is sturdy and was easy to put together. Only problem was it was too big for my cabinets. I live in an older house. Ended up putting on my counter top. It is now easy to find my spices and I wont be buying new ones when I already have that particular spice available already. I guess I like that the best about the shelf. I can find what I have and what I need immediately. Also now there is more room in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Omg how did I get by before this shelving?!
customer_reviews.text: My kitchen's spice cabinet used to look like a bomb went off in there. Nothing was organized, couldn't find what I needed, etc. I installed this and presto! now I can find what I want. No more spending more time searching for spices/ingredients, and more time cooking! P.S. I am not handy with assembling stuff, etc. Anything involving assembly and/or tools--I get my husband. However, I put this shelving together all by myself with no problems. It was very easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri H

customer_reviews.title: Why did we wait so long?!
customer_reviews.text: We lived with a hot mess of a spice cabinet for two years before finally buying this. The transformation is amazing. I literally have walked by and opened my spice cabinet just to look at how it's organized, it's that good. (OK, there isn't a lot to do during Corona 19 lockdown, but still, the cabinet looks good.) It came with so many parts I didn't use and I felt guilty throwing them away, but I just didn't need them for my basic installation. It is very sturdy and highly adjustable. I kinda wish I had more things to organize so I could buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: BrettMan

customer_reviews.title: Need and Engineering degree
customer_reviews.text: This thing came with so many directions and pieces that I still have gotten anywhere with it. Even my male friends don't want anything to do with it. Apparently you can't just put it together. You have to build it in the cabinet you will use it in. Thanks but no thanks. Wish I hadn't thrown the stupid box away. Too many parts, too complicated. Like it's just spices man! cmon!
customer_reviews.author: SandyB

customer_reviews.title: Love this rack!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using lazy susans for years but recently the spices seem to spin off when I turn the devices so I thought I'd try this. After reading the reviews, I carefully watched the instruction videos before trying to assemble. Of course with so many plastic pieces it's a bit of trial & error but no problems at all. And the storage capacity is great. Each bottle is easy to see & can be pulled down without disturbing the other spices & herbs. I'm totally delighted with the usefulness of this rack. And some days I just open the cabinet doors to admire how well organized everything is!
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinarily pleased
customer_reviews.text: Actually works as described as sometimes the "as seen on TV" stuff can be a bit dodgy. I had spices overflowing on the limited counter spaces and I desperately needed to do something. The shelves went together fairly easily, although the pieces to extend the width were a bit fiddly in getting the right width. Do that first, check the width and then put the legs on, btw. I was able to get rid of two other spice "organizers" that I'd had for ages and I still have plenty of space on the third shelf for additional stuff. I'm so very pleased and would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: FRUSTRATING
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed and frustrated with this item. Not only was it missing necessary parts, The instructions were terrible and the whole thing became very cumbersome and hard to put together. The idea is wonderful but unfortunately the end result was nothing but frustration and money spent that I cannot get back.
customer_reviews.author: apsteele

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and hard to use
customer_reviews.text: It's flimsy, a nightmare to put together, and even the "tall" legs were too short for my medium-large spice bottles. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: beedle

customer_reviews.title: Not good for shorter older shelves
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading. If you look at all of the photos all of these cabinets are tall. If you have shorter ones it still works but it doesn’t save me space. I fit a row of small up too a row of small in the middle and then all of my tall spices go in the bottom which defeats the purpose for me to save room.
customer_reviews.author: NVK

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This is kind of flimsy, really. Perhaps it is because I am missing a necessary part == the B/C/D connector piece. So, this cannot expand like it is supposed to, which is the entire reason I bought it. It took me quite a while to put it together because the pieces wouldn't fit in as well.
customer_reviews.author: James F

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy at all. Did not meet my need. Not able to use both shelves as I would like. My cabinet size would not allow for taller spices on top shelve. Return this item and got the spice stripper strips and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could have used this but it did not fit my needs. My spice bottles are not the same size. So some fit, when others didn't fit top or bottom. I even moved my shelf. OK, I can always just put the ones that don't fit aside on their own but then they wouldn't be in alphabetical order. And when you cook a lot like I do, that's important. So, I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: sparran

customer_reviews.title: Very, very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: So, I spent 1 1/2 hours tonight putting this mess together. The directions were also a mess. This absolutely does not deliver the width it claims, nor the sturdiness it promotes. I use McCormack seasonings, which are midway between the short legs and the tall legs. In order to accommodate these, both shelves are taking up way more space than they did in my cupboard. It’s shaky at best, to boot. I’ll dismantle it tomorrow and return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Kindel

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit very standard spice containers.
customer_reviews.text: The shorter legs are not long enough to allow storing standard spice containers under the sides. Raising them even just ~1/4" would have probably been enough. And they aren't short enough to be a good use of space storing small containers either. I'm not too bothered because I was getting glass jars anyway, but it is still weird. A touch flimsy too but functional.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Way too complicated. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most over-engineered, convoluted contraption I have ever ordered. There are a hundred pieces, inexplicable instructions on how to install, and it does not include shelf pins. I’m packing the pieces and returning now. The advertising misrepresents the incredible difficulty of installing this strange device.
customer_reviews.author: David Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I can see everything in the cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: All the parts in the box were initially intimidating but once I got started assembling it was easy. I found separating parts B, C and D was easiest with a slight twist. Im really pleased with how this cleaned up our spice shelf. I used the second shelf in another cabinet and had similar results. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: CrissyFi

customer_reviews.title: Won't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really help with my spice storage. Could be the size of my cabinet. I can store spices on the very bottom but notmao much on the first level. But that's because it only has room for small bottles of spices.ight would work better if my cabinets were taller but they are the typical height. Directions we're good for installation. Everything was labeled for easy install
customer_reviews.author: Natalie S.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful. Consider cabinet space
customer_reviews.text: Very good capacity. Our only constraint was that yo use the 3 levels it requires a higher cabinet. Either we kept the shelve or use the short legs. For this layout the bottom part does not take tall jars. As seen on the picture the top part had the spices and the bottom only short things. Regardless very useful
customer_reviews.author: C.R.U

customer_reviews.title: Great results! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It easy to put together. More challenging to install as my cabinet is just a smidge over 10” wide. I went with the tall legs and although I had some angst about, I actually removed a middle shelf and now have more storage not less. One concern is all of the extra parts. I wish I knew what type of plastic they are so I know if I can recycle them in my community.
customer_reviews.author: KGANNON

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, and only good for very specific size spice jars, for storing underneath. It will work in a cabinet where there are just 2 sides, BUT it's not all that sturdy in those situations. I like it though, just wanted to be honest on the cons. My husband installed it, and said it's easy. It does make finding stuff easier, and make it neater. I would buy it again if it was on sale
customer_reviews.author: DBKiss

customer_reviews.title: Turned My Herb and Spice Chaos Into An Orderly, Accessible Display
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's plastic, but it is very strong, easy to put together, and versatile as to how you can arrange the shelves to get your desired effect. Easy instructions, helpful diagrams and photos of the actual possible arrangements. Made plenty of storage space for my herbs, spices, and assorted seasoning packets. Well worth the money, and I will probably get another one to get my medicine cabinet organized.
customer_reviews.author: Meline Knago

customer_reviews.title: A little fiddly to put together but so useful!
customer_reviews.text: My only challenge was adjusting the size of this shelf and putting it together, then fitting it into my cupboard. One of the holes for the legs in one of the shelves was slightly misshapen and the leg didn't fit, but the unit still stands and works just fine with the other legs in place (there are five for each shelf). This thing changed my whole spice cabinet into a space I can use instead of a cluttered mess!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Donald

customer_reviews.title: REALLY helps organize spices
customer_reviews.text: Of course, it will be a mess again if you don't put them back in their place... BUT this is great! We used it to follow the outer sides and back of the bottom 3rd of the cabinet, and then in the middle we used for tall spice containers and other tall items and some measuring cups stacked. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: reflectionmommy

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking better!
customer_reviews.text: I painted my kitchen cabinets inside and out. I COULD NOT put my spices back the way they were. I would reach in for one spice and 2 others would fall and sometimes break open. The Spicy Shelf Deluxe was the perfect fix. I even have room to spare!! It is priced right, easy to put together, and super sturdy. Make you kitchen experience easier and put one in your cart now!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It works great for my spice cupboard. It was really a pain to put together for some reason... But once it's together it holds everything I needed it to hold! My cabinet is so much more organized now and i can see all my spices!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My, what a nice rack you have!
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I'm wary of "As Seen on TV" products, but with the review rating this has, I figured it was worth a shot. I assembled it in about 15 minutes & then loaded it up. The shelves have a rubberized layer on them, so stuff won't slide around on them. Once assembled, the shelves are surprisingly sturdy, so I think they'll last a long time. Glad I took the chance on them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dryphtyr

customer_reviews.title: Best spice rack organizer I have come across
customer_reviews.text: I am an organizing freak! This rack I just love and since I have placed it and my spices in my cabinet...my cooking ventures have become so much easier to find my spices to complete my recipes. My friends were over for dinner a week ago and they kept opening my cabinets and asking if I would come over to their homes to organize their spice cabinets...for a price hahaha!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I’m still not 💯 I installed it correctly I might need my hubby to come through and double check but it totally revamped my small spice cupboard and makes things so much easier to find now and see what I actually have so I’m not double or triple buying because something got shoved back in the corner
customer_reviews.author: Bre-Ana

customer_reviews.title: Good for organization
customer_reviews.text: Our spice cabinet was a mess and hard to find what you were looking for. We bought this to help organize and make things somewhat more accessible. The directions are really straightforward and every went together easily. It feels sturdy with everything on it and I have no doubt it will hold for a long time. Overall it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jlrrx2206

customer_reviews.title: Really worked for me
customer_reviews.text: This unit, while it was a bit more difficult to assemble than I anticipated, was pretty near perfect for what I needed. It is flexible and sturdy, and provides an excellent solution to storing many bottles of spices in a small space. The top shelf is a little too low to handle taller spice jars below it, which can be a bother, but there's enough room on the top shelf to handle most of my taller jars.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: returned it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly in good condition. Unfortunately after studying the videos on how to assemble, three legs went in fine, the fourth leg would not go in. Very frustrating, and there is no email or website to contact the seller. Returned and bought one that is put together already.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Very customizable and great too!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought another type of spice rack holder but this one fit perfect and looks better than I could've imagined. I read a lot of reviews on here. It fit in my awkward shaped apartment style small cabinet above my stove. Thank you for all of the customizable pieces to make it work!!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, very functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. Only thing I would change is that the smallest legs would be just a bit taller. The tallest legs are too tall, and the shortest legs are too short for most McCormick spices. So you're forced to use the tallest legs, which takes up more vertical space than necessary. Other than that, I like these very much.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely intimidating opening the box with all the parts and directions, but I forged on and it was actually pretty easy. A lot of left overs for the various ways to assemble. Does take a bit of time, but not difficult. End result looks great as I can actually now see what I have
customer_reviews.author: Napagal

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I got mine today. I took it out of the package it’s very complicated to put together there’s several pages of instructions very confusing and I wasn’t able to do anything at all. I’m gonna have a friend try to do it otherwise I’ll end up sending it back. There’s like a zillion parts to it it could be a lot easier. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: MEH.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a newer home with wider cupboards, you'll be lucky to get one shelf out of this, with a bunch of useless leftover pieces. Construction baffled my wife and Lego-Genius high school son. I put it together in about 5 minutes, it works as advertised, but nothing to brag about. In hindsight and for a third of the price, I could have built the same in my garage with some thin plywood and dowels. I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have to return it =(
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 stars but I actually have to return it and look into another organizer. It’s too tall for my cabinets (can’t remove cabinet shelves to add/remove space) and I didn’t realize I couldn’t use it on my wire shelves in my pantry unless I put down some type of solid something to keep it from falling through. It does seem sturdy and it looked even all the way around. I really wanted to keep it but there’s no point if I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: WaliyyahB.

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: The video reviews and/or youtube will help you set up easily. This made my cooking life so much easier. TIPS: MEASURE YOUR CABINETS I couldve bought 2 to complete the look but it worked out since i wanted to keep the liquid cooking products over the stove as well
customer_reviews.author: Mia A

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Lots of pieces and not the best of directions made this a bit tough to assemble but once I understood the premise I had no problems. VERY sturdy. Looks great. It's made a huge difference in useable space in my cabinet. Looking for other places around the house that I might need to organize now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I so wanted to like this
customer_reviews.text: Why oh why did they not make the long legs a little shorter or the short legs a little longer. Did the manufacturer do any survey of the height of standard spice bottles??? I have not decided whether to keep or not but I am disappointedl
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dub

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in February. I finally got around to opening and assembling only to realize that I received an incomplete set. Missing one set of short legs, one set of long legs, both left and right sides of the "c" and "d" pieces for the top and the bottom shelf. In terms of sturdiness, had I received everything, it probably would've done well enough. Unfortunately, now its unusable in my current kitchen cabinet.... waste of money. also, can't contact the manufacturer. As other people have mentioned, there are an unnecessary amount of pieces to put together... everything just snaps together but the instruction manual is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Take control of your spice cabinet with the Spicy Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This my second spicy shelf purchase, and the latest version has made some welcomed updates. It is hard to put into words how happy having spice organization makes me. Despite being an 'as seen on tv' type product, the Spicy Shelf delivers and is a must-have in my kitchen. The kit gives you endless options and works with kitchens both small and large. I have also purchased this for many close friends and family after opening their spice cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I had every intention of using this for spices...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this from Amazon, expecting to use it to organize my spices. Now I have to order another one, because I used the first one to organize other goods in my pantry! It created more space and makes it look much neater. I may be ordering two more of them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Wasn’t sure it would fit or hold everything but it does. It left a bit of room on the side after fully extended and stacked in my cabinet which actually works well for extra tall items like olive oil, bread crumbs, etc. This made finding spices a million times easier. I adjusted it so small spices can fit on top, medium in the middle and tall spices underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Arehart

customer_reviews.title: Not like TV
customer_reviews.text: Cool product, in theory, kind of like pineapple on pizza. Bought this for a new house, after a 30 day escrow we finally moved in and I got to unpack. The product was busted in several places in the box but I was past the date to be able to return it, which was my fault of course not theirs's. Live and learn. I'd not recommend the product, it's cheesy looking and less than stellular.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Littell

customer_reviews.title: alright
customer_reviews.text: wow. this was a chore to put together. i have no idea why but it came with so many parts and the description was overwhelmingly confusing. i am not a novice in putting things together but this kicked my butt regardless it s together and done with. it s not as sturdy as i expected, kind of wobbly
customer_reviews.author: Czekchik

customer_reviews.title: It does not expand to fit every shelf like the product advertises
customer_reviews.text: Actually isn’t true that the product fits any shelf. We actually had to order a second product to get to Part Bs so it expands and both the first and second shelf. It isn’t actualy the seller that is the problem. It’s really more than the product isn’t as versatile as it looks on advertisements.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Love it, & easy set up
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this. Very easy to set up. Was a bit worried when I opened the box and there were so many bags of parts. But by watching the videos online I realized its a snap to set up & all those parts are for all the different ways you can set it up. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: hockeymom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and saved us some storage space
customer_reviews.text: Used one shelf each in the kitchen on two different, existing shelves. Very nice addition and much better looking than before. Much easier to see and remove whatever you need from the shelf. A little wonky on the instructions but not too bad once I figured them out. Good product. My wife was skeptical but after seeing them installed and re-arranging those shelves, she is glad we purchased the organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish it worked for us
customer_reviews.text: I wish this worked for our spice cabinet but unfortunately our shelving heights didn’t make it practical. The short legs made the top ledge too high and any spice jars slightly taller than McCormick or Ms Dash seasoning couldn’t fit, and the same goes for putting any underneath which defeats the whole purpose. It’s a shame because it’s a ridiculously simple product to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing spices/medicine cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my medicine cabinet. Was reluctant to get it after reading some reviews about it being hard to put together, but it wasn’t bad at all (as long as you read directions). It is also nice because it comes we’re you can break it up into two separate shelves or multilevel shelves. Makes you feel organized and easier to find things!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Simon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I can't say enough about these things. I set up my new kitchen with these. I can see every spice I have at a glance. I have a lot. These are perfect for small or large spaces. They are so efficient and space saving. All I can say is buy them and see for yourself. I would recommend this product to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: It’s Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Measure your cabinet and compare to the sizing listed in the add. This rack is quite well made, it complicated to assemble. We were only able to use a small portion of the rack as it did not fit our cabinet well. It did free up som space compared to a previous rack.
customer_reviews.author: H2OLvr

customer_reviews.title: Finally a solution we can use!
customer_reviews.text: We had a very small messy spice cabinet and have tried several organizational options, this by far was the best purchase. After some trial and error we figured out the best layout. The only thing the would’ve helped was more pictures organizing layout suggestions on the instructions. That helps give you and understanding of what works the best. If you have a messy cabinet this will help a ton with organizing and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and order it.
customer_reviews.text: We are doing a kitchen renovation. I have purchased several things from stores and amazon. This is the most useful and best single item I’ve bought. The cabinet I got this for is 18” OAW and fits great inside. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: I should have returned it
customer_reviews.text: It took so long to put together and then I couldn’t fit the second level shelf in my cabinet. Either the shelf was too short to fit any spices or I could only use 1 level. If it weren’t such a pain to take it apart to return it, well really, I should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie May

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this product was going to resolve my spice shelf issue; not a chance. It's quite the typical :as seen on TV" product. It'd good it you have a small space and not many spice containers. It's too limited for the today spices. No one seems to carry the same size. Too many variations and it you have limited space - this won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Cordelia Spera

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: I have one of the most skinniest cabinets for my spices. Its a paint to find what I need. Now that I have this handy organizer I can find it quickly and I don't have to take everything out to get at it. I had to put it together inside the cabinet but that was the least of my worries. I'm glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa Adkins

customer_reviews.title: cool stuff
customer_reviews.text: we have lots n lots of herbs and spices so i bought 2 boxes. 1 was enough as it turned out. ya gotta like the way this gear cleans up and organizes cupboards. very tidy. made of plastic so its not the strongest but, for the money, with some care, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald m Driver

customer_reviews.title: It took my a minute to figure out the instructions, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase so far (I only just installed). I did have a false start or two reading the instructions, but I think that was user error on my part. Once I figured it out, I am very happy with them. They are giving me tons of extra space in my cabinets and I can already tell that I'm going to have a much easier time of finding all of my spices
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Organizational Nirvana
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing and I plan to order another for my baking cabinet. I use a lot of spices and spice blends. Make everything from homemade sausages to bundt cakes to bread to holiday dinners. This has made life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Wolf

customer_reviews.title: What A Difference!
customer_reviews.text: Our cabinets are pretty narrow and I was always knocking stuff over trying to find what i was looking for. These shelves are so simple and easy to install and have made such a huge difference. I snagged them on a lightening deal, but loved them so much I got my sister one at regular price.
customer_reviews.author: Ackpfft

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good spice rack
customer_reviews.text: Smaller (widthwise) than I thought but pretty impressive configuration. Also bought the circular two tier spice rack. The two tier is just a teeny bit small for the taller spices (they fit with some wiggling) but a better value overall.
customer_reviews.author: KSM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: so glad i decided to try this my cupboard is so organized now i don't have spices falling out all over the place have tons of room now and easy to find which spice i want easy to fit and install and i even put the other one in our medicine cabinet love how you can find everything and it is so organized
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clever, make spicy shelf for larger containers please
customer_reviews.text: This is a clever product. I'm not knocking spices on the floor anymore searching for the right one. I wish they made one that fits all my large spice containers from Sams. I had to put those in another cubboard.
customer_reviews.author: diy mom

customer_reviews.title: Good to have!
customer_reviews.text: Before & after, obviously. It didn't make any more space for more spices BUT it is SOOO much easier to see exactly what I've got & where! It came in a bunch of pieces & was kind of a pain to put together but in the end it was worth it. I'm happy with it. Glad I got it. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Barefootfairy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!! My spice cabinet looks like a professional organizer got in there! Now I can cook without searching and leaving14 small spice bottles on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: PACZ

customer_reviews.title: Quality of life!
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a spice resolution for my pantry-less kitchen. I hated to spend basically $30 on plastic shelving but so glad I did! It is sturdy and one of the only cabinet designs that I seen logical for a lot of spices. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: jshell

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize spices
customer_reviews.text: We had so many spice bottles in our cabinet that made it hard to see them all but this adjustable shelf creates 3 tiers helped us get everything organized and visible. Wish we would have found this earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Helpful not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this. I had to have someone else figure out installation.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Morganstein

customer_reviews.title: Love the versatility
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I was a little skeptically at first because my cabinet it deep and narrow but they fit perfectly! Putting the shelves together is a little difficult and you need patience to do so but overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: I had to manipulate the shelf heights myself as they do not accommodate different size spices. If your spices are all the same size then it would work well, but if you have different size heights you'll have to come up with your own idea on how to work with that. I had to set it up on 1" blocks to make it fit. Advice to manufacturer: just make different size pillar options and you'd have a much better product. I kept it, but only because I had the patience and ingenuity to make it work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many configurable options, almost too many
customer_reviews.text: Measurement sizes are exact.... make sure you know exactly how you want to use this. There are tons of configurable options for making it bigger or smaller or taller or shorter. Nice non slip pads on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not the right fit for me
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t the right fit for my needs. Seemed like you needed to have just the right cabinet size for it to work. Mine were too wide. Product was sturdy and would’ve worked with my cabinets were smaller
customer_reviews.author: Marbear

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So this is FANTASTIC. It's nice and sturdy and super effective in creating extra space. My hubby said it wasn't hard to figure out. I just ordered two more for the medicine cabinet! It feels nice to be organized!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: It's okay - not really that adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this because of the reviews but am kind of disappointed. The materials are a bit flimsy and the height is not really adjustable - there are only two choices with a fixed height of the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Shandy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would work for our spice cabinet but because of the awkward shape our cabinet is, it didn't fit. I would recommend this item to other people. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Just did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I was bummed to find that it did not fit well in my new cabinets. I did move one of the cabinet shelves so I could put one of these spicy shelves in but that was it. They were too big at the smallest option to put two of these shelves side by side and too tall to put both on top of each other. So I used one and gave one away.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Marceau

customer_reviews.title: Loved it in old house, bought again for new house.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It lets me put spices in 3 rows (in alphabetical order). It expands to the width of the cabinet so no space is wasted. We had this in our old house, and I loved it so much, I bought it again when we moved.
customer_reviews.author: Opal S J

product_meta.title: Spicy Shelf Deluxe - Expandable Spice Rack and Stackable Cabinet & Pantry Organizer (1 Set of 2 shelves) - As seen on TV
feature_bullets: Is your Spicy Shelf Deluxe real? See the description to learn how to tell a fake (and poor quality) one from a REAL Spicy Shelf Deluxe
New and improved Spicy Shelf Deluxe! 5 times stronger than the original. Now holds up to 40 pounds and has a "non-slip" surface!

Spicy Shelf Deluxe is not just for Spices. With over a million already sold, satisfied customers everywhere are using their Spicy Shelve to organize EVERYTHING in their cabinets! Spices, pill & supplement bottles, fingernail polish, crafts and more!
One set of 2 shelves. Stackable, or side by side. 2 different size legs for short or tall spice bottles.
Organize up to 64 spices and see them all at a glance! Spicy Shelf Deluxe is the ultimate stackable cabinet organizer! It can turn a mess of spices into an organized masterpiece!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars3,858 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
